oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hierarchical recognition of dynamic hand gestures for telerobotic application
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MAMMEN, JP
CHAUDHURY, S
AGRAWAL, T
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: gesture recognition
finite state machine
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper a scheme is presented for recognizing hand gestures using the output of a hand tracker which tracks a rectangular window bounding the hand region. A hierarchical scheme for dynamic hand gesture recognition is proposed based on the dominant feature trajectories using an a priori knowledge of the way in which each gesture is performed. A state representation is obtained from the dominant feature trajectories, where the states correspond to perceptually important segments of hand movement characterizing the gesture.
